summary: Order 046 closed: Lore layer metadata threads are live end-to-end, Alfa Zero exposes an operator-controlled toggle, evidence captured via contracts/tests, and comfort/outlands guides refreshed with consent notes.

notes: overlay_flow.py, overlay_bridge.py, trace_utils.py, and telemetry/narrator shells now accept overlay_id + layer_kind; payload telemetry stubs include matched metadata.
Validated dispatch path through python -m tools.contract_test_runner --case overlay_lore_dispatch.
alfa_zero_ui.py exposes a Lore overlay toggle with explicit consent gating and session telemetry stitches.
Lore dispatch proof captured via overlay_lore_dispatch contract sample; payload extensions carry overlay metadata and matching trace_id.
Added overlay lore coverage to tests/test_overlay_flow.py and refreshed contract runner suite; full python -m tools.contract_test_runner run passes.
comfort_happy_path.md, automation_quick_start.md, outlands_index.md, and planning/inlands_and_outlands.md describe the Lore activation protocol and cooldown notes.
Ledger updated (exchange/ledger/2025-11.md) and this report filed for War Office review.

follow_ups: Scope music and ritual layer pilots using the Lore toggle scaffolding once operator feedback lands.
Coordinate with War Office on ack for order-2025-11-09-045 to retire interim draft report.
